mapper.update: update base_element set elementid=elementid ,code=#{code} ,name=#{name} ,type=#{type} ,uri=#{uri} ,menuid=#{menuid} ,parenid=#{parenid} ,method=#{method} ,description=#{description} where elementid=#{elementid}

update base_element set elementid=elementid ,code=#{code} ,name=#{name} ,type=#{type} ,uri=#{uri} ,menuid=#{menuid} ,parenid=#{parenid} ,method=#{method} ,description=#{description} where 1=1 and elementid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and elementid =#{Where_Id} and elementid=#{Where_elementid} and code=#{Where_code} and name=#{Where_name} and type=#{Where_type} and uri=#{Where_uri} and menuid=#{Where_menuid} and parenid=#{Where_parenid} and method=#{Where_method} and description=#{Where_description}
mapper.select: select t.elementid "elementid", t.code "code", t.name "name", t.type "type", t.uri "uri", t.menuid "menuid", t.parenid "parenid", t.method "method", t.description "description" from base_element t where elementid=#{elementid}

select t.elementid "elementid", t.code "code", t.name "name", t.type "type", t.uri "uri", t.menuid "menuid", t.parenid "parenid", t.method "method", t.description "description" from base_element t where 1=1 and t.elementid=#{elementid} and t.code=#{code} and t.name=#{name} and t.type=#{type} and t.uri=#{uri} and t.menuid=#{menuid} and t.parenid=#{parenid} and t.method=#{method} and t.description=#{description}

select t.elementid "elementid", t.code "code", t.name "name", t.type "type", t.uri "uri", t.menuid "menuid", t.parenid "parenid", t.method "method", t.description "description" from base_element t where 1=1 and t.elementid=#{elementid} and t.code=#{code} and t.name=#{name} and t.type=#{type} and t.uri=#{uri} and t.menuid=#{menuid} and t.parenid=#{parenid} and t.method=#{method} and t.description=#{description}
mapper.delete: delete from base_element where 1=1 and elementid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and elementid =#{Where_Id} and elementid=#{Where_elementid} and code=#{Where_code} and name=#{Where_name} and type=#{Where_type} and uri=#{Where_uri} and menuid=#{Where_menuid} and parenid=#{Where_parenid} and method=#{Where_method} and description=#{Where_description}
mapper.select: select t.elementid "elementid", t.code "code", t.name "name", t.type "type", t.uri "uri", t.menuid "menuid", t.parenid "parenid", t.method "method", t.description "description" from base_element t where 1=1 and t.elementid=#{elementid} and t.code=#{code} and t.name=#{name} and t.type=#{type} and t.uri=#{uri} and t.menuid=#{menuid} and t.parenid=#{parenid} and t.method=#{method} and t.description=#{description}

select count(*) from base_element t where 1=1 and t.elementid=#{elementid} and t.elementid!=#{NoId} and t.code=#{code} and t.name=#{name} and t.type=#{type} and t.uri=#{uri} and t.menuid=#{menuid} and t.parenid=#{parenid} and t.method=#{method} and t.description=#{description}
